snippet: The New York medical examiner’s office is undertaking an ambitious effort to identify bodies.
abstract: New York City medical examiner's office is undertaking an ambitious effort to identify the nameless dead in the city's potter's fields, seeking to capitalize on the expertise that it has gained over the last decade identifying remains from the World Trade Center attack; office is conducting a systematic review of old cases, in which autopsy samples are still available, as well as opening graves that hold unidentified bodies.
lead_paragraph: The New York medical examiner’s office is undertaking an ambitious effort to identify bodies.

headline.seo: Medical Examiner Opens Old Cases, and Graves, to Identify Dead
headline.main: Unearthing Remains in Potter's Field to Give Names Back to the Nameless
headline.print_headline: Opening Graves to Restore Names to the Nameless

keywords.value: Office of the Chief Medical Examiner of the City of New York
keywords.name: organizations
